OLX is an anticancer compound that antagonizes the prosurvival Mcl-1 protein belonging to the Bcl-2 family of proteins. it triggers apoptosis in cancer cells by occupying a hydrophobic pocket in the BH3 binding groove of Bcl-2 proteins.
